lore: Plague Herbalists have a prodigious knowledge about the effects of plants. Indeed, the healers of other species learned many of their secrets from them.\n\nPlague Herbalists detest rulers who use their position to gain wealth and power at the expense of the lives of their subjects. After a great victory, the Herbalist sneaks under the banquet table, where it splashes a special compound, imbued with its own power, that discourages the sovereign, making them lose their will to continue fighting.
menagerieDialog: Bend over, grab your ankles, and cough!
(It points at you, then mimes a drinking motion. Unsure about how to respond, you pretend to be distracted by another one of your creatures.)
(It hands you a vial full of purple liquid. You shake your head as if to reject its offer, and it glances downward with a sad look on its face.)
(It picks its nose, but it's not really gross because its nose is a mask. Pretty neat.)
(It was busy mixing a potion before you startled it and caused it to drop its vials on the ground.)
name: Plague Herbalist
